section.para: NET (Natural English Tokenizer) is a tool that helps in scanning and parsing text written in natural english in order to prepare them for spell-cheking and grammar checking.

section.title: Wed Nov 27 18:30 modified the tokenizer as a class

listitem.para: created tokenizer class in order to allow use of tokenizer objects
